Caption: Union Minister for Education Shri M.C. Chagla gives away the Siemens prize to Mr. Kanianthra Mani Chandy.  The Siemens Prize consisted of a Bronze Medal and National Savings Certificate of the value of Rs. 75 which was given to the best student in Electrical Engineering Branch. Chandy went on to do his Masters from New York University and Ph.D. from Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He served in the field of academics for over 40 years, having won several awards in the field and also from the University of Texas and Caltech, where he taught and guided over 30 Ph.D. students. He was given the distinguished Alumnus Award from IIT-Madras in 2019.
